text: Shirley Mills is an unincorporated village in the town of Shirley, Piscataquis County, Maine, United States. The community is northwest of Dover-Foxcroft. Shirley Mills had a post office until June 20, 1986; it still has its own ZIP code, 04485. ==References== Category:Villages in Piscataquis County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: Shirley Mills, Maine
